item.title: Dual Encoder GAN Inversion for High-Fidelity 3D Head Reconstruction from Single Images
item.description: Dual encoder GAN inversion achieves high-fidelity 3D head reconstruction from single images by cleverly combining outputs from encoders specialized for visible and invisible regions, surpassing existi…

item.title: Team-Fictitious Play for Reaching Team-Nash Equilibrium in Multi-team Games
item.description: Team-Fictitious Play (Team-FP) enables self-interested agents to learn near-optimal team coordination in multi-team games, reaching a Team-Nash equilibrium with quantifiable error bounds.
